product_name: Hunt's Best Ever Tomato Ketchup, 38 oz Bottle
description: Contains one 38-ounce squeeze bottle of Hunt's Best Ever Tomato Ketchup. More thick, more rich, no corners cut with this delicious tomato condiment. Hunt's Ketchup is made from California-grown, vine-ripened tomatoes. It's Hunt's thickest tomato ketchup to dip, top or cook with burgers, fries, nuggets, meatloaf, tots and more. This non-GMO, all-natural ketchup has no additives, preservatives or high fructose corn syrup.

latest_reviews.comment: I don't eat it but it must taste good since my daughter will not eat hotdogs without it. It was also a good price compared to the grocery stores nearby.
